Package Components

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
Components.Component
Components.Sprite
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Sprite
extends Component
Gives the object a visible sprite that the drawing thread takes care of
Author:
Pere

    • Sprite

      public Sprite​(java.lang.String filePath, boolean matchCollision, GameObject owner)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      filePath - path to image file with name and extension
      matchCollision - Whether to show the sprite with the same size as the collision box(if true) or use the images original size(if false)
      owner - (usually, "this")

    • draw

      public void draw​(java.awt.Graphics2D g, Camera camera, short sWidth, short sHeight)
      Draws the sprite to the render buffer performing the needed transformations. Called by the render thread.
      Parameters:
      g - graphics
      camera - object
      sWidth - Screen width
      sHeight - Screen Height
